name: user-search
title: User Search
oneLiner: A search input for user content

apiDoc.name: UserSearchCombobox
apiDoc.description: A user search combobox with live results using bits-ui Combobox. Searches by name, NIP-05, or npub with debounced input. Shows up to 8 results with avatar, name, and handle. Features custom input snippet support, configurable debounce, and selection callback. Uses createUserInput builder for search logic.

props.name: placeholder
props.default: Search users by name, NIP-05, npub...

props.name: debounceMs
props.description: Debounce delay for search in milliseconds

props.name: input
props.type: Snippet<[{ value: string; oninput: (e: Event) => void; loading: boolean }]>
props.description: Custom Svelte 5 snippet for input element
